capability.name: Party Routing Profile
capability.definition: This service domain maintains a small profile of key indicators for a customer that is referenced during customer interactions to facilitate routing, servicing and product/service fulfillment decisions. This can include status (such as account in arrears), ratings (such as high value customer) and alerts (such possible fraud activity detected)
capability.role: The customer profile service domain is used to tune the customer experience during any real-time interaction with the bank. A collection of status indicators, ratings and alerts can be maintained that are then used to influence the routing and servicing decisions that govern the customer interaction. For example a status indicator could include a warning that the account is in distress which would limit sales activity and might result in routing a contact to a specialist account recovery servicing facility.
capability.example: The identity and active status of a customer is checked as they present themselves on-line to access their bank account

key_features.name: Track and provide customer status flags (e.g. in arrears)
key_features.description: Enables track and provide customer status flags (e.g. in arrears) to support this service domain maintains a small profile of key indicators for a customer that is referenced during customer interactions to facilitate routing, servicing and product/service fulfillment decisions

key_features.name: Track and provide customer ratings (e.g. credit rating)
key_features.description: Enables track and provide customer ratings (e.g. credit rating) to support this service domain maintains a small profile of key indicators for a customer that is referenced during customer interactions to facilitate routing, servicing and product/service fulfillment decisions

key_features.name: Track and provide customer alerts (e.g. possible fraud activity)
key_features.description: Enables track and provide customer alerts (e.g. possible fraud activity) to support this service domain maintains a small profile of key indicators for a customer that is referenced during customer interactions to facilitate routing, servicing and product/service fulfillment decisions
